Microbiotic Biodonatum

Enjoy Biodonatum as an important part of a balanced and varied diet, a healthy lifestyle and active longevity.

Biodonatum – Don’t hide your age – change it!

  • Supports the diversity of your unique gut microbiota.
  • Special combination of scientifically tested 16 strains of bacteria.
  • Does not contain animal proteins, gluten, yeast or lactose.
  • Does not contain artificial colors or flavors.
  • Suitable for people with dairy allergies.
  • Improved digestion.
  • Weight stabilization.

Weight: 1 package 150 grams 30 sachets of 5 ml.

We transfer 1% of your purchase to orphans to pay for their education

Buy 1 pack now

Our digestive system is an amazing and diverse world that contains 100 trillion bacteria. In 2017, the human microbiome was recognized as a separate organ. Humans have 21,000 genes, and the bacteria that make up our body have 4.4 million genes. Already today, scientists have been able to classify about 5,000 microorganisms in our microbiome, which in 90% of cases cannot be cultivated in laboratory conditions. Therefore, we are saying that a person, together with genetically compatible microorganisms living in his intestines, represents a Superorganism with the organized work of enzymes encoded by the human genome and the genomes of all symbiotic microorganisms. About 2.5-3 kg of bacteria live in our intestines; their weight is approximately equal to the weight of the human brain. It has been scientifically proven that the gut and brain communicate through the vagus nerve. The intestine is the first organ of the body’s immune system and contains more than 80% of all immunoglobulins, 10 (6) lymphocytes and 1 g of lymphoid tissue.
